casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Terraine Sanchez BYERS. No. 69P06-3. Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 17, 2016. Terraine S. Byers, for Byers, Terraine Sanchez. Derrick Mertz, Special Deputy Attorney General, for State of NC. R. Andrew Murray, District Attorney, for State of NC.

AMENDED ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Defendant on the 25th of January 2016 in this matter for a writ of certiorari to review the order of the North Carolina Court of Appeals, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals: "Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 17th of March 2016." ERVIN, J., recused.
